Dear Sir  or Madam , 
 
RE: Gexcon Consulting Graduate Safety & Risk Role  
 
It is with great professional enthusiasm that I approach Gexcon Consulting with the goal of exploring an entry -level 
opportunity, such as the Graduate Process Safety & Risk Engineer role at Warrington, Cheshire. Equi pped with a 
Masters’ degree in Chemical Engineering from the University of Leeds where I attained an Upper Second -Class Honours. 
I am well -prepared to immerse myself in a dynamic role at your company, allowing me to apply the technical skills, soft 
skills and knowledge gained throughout my degree.  
Gexcon Consulting’s presence and  10 Fenwick Road   
Houghton Regis  
Dunstable  
LU5 5RP  
Gexcon Consulting UK  
831 Birchwood Blvd  
Birchwood  
Warrington  
WA3 7QZ  
 
Date: 23 December 2020  
Dear Sir  or Madam , 
 
RE: Gexcon Consulting Graduate Safety & Risk Role  
 
It is with great professional enthusiasm that I approach Gexcon Consulting with the goal of exploring an entry -level 
opportunity, such as the Graduate Process Safety & Risk Engineer role at Warrington, Cheshire. Equi pped with a 
Masters’ degree in Chemical Engineering from the University of Leeds where I attained an Upper Second -Class Honours. 
I am well -prepared to immerse myself in a dynamic role at your company, allowing me to apply the technical skills, soft 
skills and knowledge gained throughout my degree.  
Gexcon Consulting’s presence and influence in the engineering field, be it within process safety & risk management or 
fire & explosion testing, cannot be understated and the organisation is internationally recognised as an industry leader. 
Your company consistently delivers excellent process hazard analysis (PHA) and explosion migration system testing 
solutions in an evolving  business environment with a 100 % record of delivering on time and to budget . The p roblem -
solving culture would allow me to continuously challenge myself and reach my full potential. All your clients such as 
Dupont & ExxonMobil have been impacted very positively by your expertise in hazard identification and hazard and 
operability studie s (HAZOP).  
The graduate role that’s being offered encapsulated the environment that I want to start my career in as you focus on 
the development of individuals by offering the opportunit y to work with a variety of different teams on different issues  
and c areer centered development pathways such as chemical engineering chartership. This will allow me to vastly 
expand my engineering knowledge and I want to do this by submerging myself in the diverse culture that Gexcon 
Consulting provides.  Furthermore, I wou ld be valuable to the process safety team at your company due to my academic 
history, work experience and personal attributes.  Throughout my education and experience as a Chemical Engineer, I 
have gained technical skills such problem solving and project ma nagement which will allow me to approach and tackle 
a range of challenging problems confidently and effectively.  
I am keen to gain an in -depth of knowledge on process safety and risk management procedures utilised as well as gaining 
a significant understa nding of the company. My summer internship with the Royal Navy and Fast Futures (virtual 
placement)  gave me the ability to learn invaluable knowledge and skills from experienced, passionate people within 
 
their compan ies. Having worked as an engineering intern with the Royal Navy, I was able to work under pressure to 
ensure work was exceptional and led my group in presentations.   
 
Also, I have demonstrated excellent communication and interpersonal skills combined with an ability to work well either 
as part of a collaborative team or autonomously during my time as a Lab technician with UK Biocentre,  something which 
is needed to succeed when working in fast-paced  environments.  Being course representative for over 200 student s and 
chemical engineering ambassador further enhanced my communication and interpersonal skills. I am proficient in the 
use of Aspen HYSYS, Ansys Fluent, Microsoft Applications, MATLAB, and Visio software. You will find me to be a highly 
productive indivi dual, quick to grasp essential procedures and protocols, and possessing the stamina to do whatever it 
takes to complete the task set before me.  
 
Finally, I believe would be an excellent candidate foe this role because I am driven, enthusiastic to learn and  adaptable 
and I am committed to playing an active part in making the company even more successful. All these attributes coupled 
with a strong work ethic will lead me to succeed in this role.  
 
Thank you for taking the time to consider my application. I am looking forward to hearing from you soon.  
 
Sincerely,  
 
Kagiso Eric Mhlanga  (AMIChemE)

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
